def.dt: :a yellow or white solid food that is made from milk noncount a piece of cheese Sprinkle the casserole with cheese. grated/melted cheese count imported cheeses a mild cheese often used before another noun cheese sandwiches/omelets a cheese [=cheesy] sauce/spread

dt.snote: If you say the word “cheese” in an exaggerated way, you look like you are smiling, so someone who is taking your photograph and wants you to smile will tell you to say cheese.

def.dt: :a mild cheese made in the U.S. from cheddar cheese
:the most powerful or important person You'll have to ask the big cheese. [=the boss] Who's the big cheese around here?
:a kind of cheese that is white with lines of blue mold and that has a strong flavor
:a type of soft white cheese that has a mild flavor
:a soft white cheese made from milk and cream
:a cheese that is made from goat's milk
:cheese that can be pulled apart in narrow strips
:a type of cheese that is hard and pale yellow and that has many large holes
:a device used for lifting something heavy (such as a car)
:a playing card that has a picture of a soldier or servant and that is worth more than a ten and less than a queen the jack of hearts/spades/clubs/diamonds see picture at playing card
:a small opening where something connects with a wire to something else a telephone/stereo jack
:a small usually metal object that has six points and that is used in the game of jacks
:a child's game in which jacks are thrown and picked up while bouncing and catching a small ball children playing jacks
:anything at all used in negative statements You don't know jack. = (offensive) You don't know jack shit.
